name: twotruthsandatwist_create_round
description: Create a new game round with a question and three statements. The twist should be playful, surprising, and entertaining - not just factually incorrect.

question.description: The main question for the round

trivia_1.description: First statement - can be truth or twist

trivia_2.description: Second statement - can be truth or twist

trivia_3.description: Third statement - can be truth or twist

name: twotruthsandatwist_submit_guess
description: Submit a player's guess for which statement is the twist

guess_index.description: Index of the guessed statement (0, 1, or 2)

name: twotruthsandatwist_reveal_twist
description: Reveal which statement was the twist and provide explanations. The explanations should be entertaining and playful - build anticipation and make the reveal fun!

twist_index.description: Index of the twist statement (0, 1, or 2)

explanation_1.description: Explanation for statement 1 - be creative and entertaining

explanation_2.description: Explanation for statement 2 - be creative and entertaining

explanation_3.description: Explanation for statement 3 - be creative and entertaining

name: twotruthsandatwist_get_round
description: Get details of a specific round

round_id.description: The ID of the round to retrieve

name: twotruthsandatwist_get_last_round
description: Get details of the most recent round
